related.meaning: Ucapan selamat tahun baru, kartu tahun baru
tahun di sekolah, kelas di sekolah

lessons.japanese: ベートーベンは晩年耳が聞こえなかった。
lessons.indonesian: Beethoven was deaf in his late years.

lessons.japanese: ブラウン氏は晩年に入っている。
lessons.indonesian: Mr Brown is in the sunset of his life.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は悲しみを隠して晩年を送った。
lessons.indonesian: She spent her later life with a hidden sorrow.

lessons.japanese: 彼は晩年を自伝を書くことに献げた。
lessons.indonesian: He devoted the last years of his life to writing his autobiography.

lessons.japanese: 彼はピカソが晩年に描いた絵を手に入れた。
lessons.indonesian: He obtained a picture which Picasso had painted in his later years.

lessons.japanese: 晩年になってそのけちは気前がよくなった。
lessons.indonesian: Late in life the miser learned to be generous with money.
